viewData.name: Neutralizer 10ml
viewData.short_description: The purpose of this product is to neutralise the acidic media exposure. It is the reaction blocker. The product is necessary since acids could damage the skin severely unless they are prevented from penetrating into it.
viewData.long_description: The purpose of this product is to neutralise the acidic media exposure. It is the reaction blocker. The product is necessary since acids could damage the skin severely unless they are prevented from penetrating into it.
